worldstate_json: {"current_state": {"room_temp": 0.0, "hot_gas_temp": 22.9, "liquid_temp": 22.8, "suction_temp": 20.0, "ambient_temp": 23.3, "door_open": true}, "flags": {"main_temp_high": true, "hot_gas_low": false, "liquid_extreme": false, "suction_extreme": true, "ambient_extreme": false}, "trends_30m": {"room_temp_trend": 2.8, "door_open_ratio": 0.15}, "health_scores": {"cooling_performance": 25, "compressor_health": 40}}
typical_pattern: Koelcel bereikt temperatuur niet (0°C, veel te hoog). Verdamper volledig bevroren met dikke ijslaag. Zuigleiding extreem koud. Luchtcirculatie nauwelijks aanwezig. Ontdooicyclus werkt niet correct. Warmteoverdracht geblokkeerd door ijs.

worldstate_json: {"current_state": {"room_temp": -15.0, "hot_gas_temp": 65.0, "liquid_temp": 45.0, "suction_temp": -20.0, "ambient_temp": 25.0, "door_open": false}, "flags": {"main_temp_high": true, "hot_gas_low": false, "liquid_extreme": false, "suction_extreme": false, "ambient_extreme": false}, "trends_30m": {"room_temp_trend": 1.5, "door_open_ratio": 0.0}, "health_scores": {"cooling_performance": 60, "compressor_health": 70}}
typical_pattern: Temperatuur in koelcel te hoog (-15°C ipv -33°C). Condensor ventilatoren draaien niet. Warmteophoping bij condensor (voelbaar heet). Hoge condensatiedruk. Heetgastemperatuur te hoog (>60°C). Warmteafvoer onvoldoende.

worldstate_json: {"current_state": {"room_temp": -20.0, "hot_gas_temp": 45.0, "liquid_temp": 30.0, "suction_temp": -25.0, "ambient_temp": 22.0, "door_open": false}, "flags": {"main_temp_high": true, "hot_gas_low": false, "liquid_extreme": true, "suction_extreme": true, "ambient_extreme": false}, "trends_30m": {"room_temp_trend": 0.8, "door_open_ratio": 0.0}, "health_scores": {"cooling_performance": 50, "compressor_health": 60}}
typical_pattern: Onvoldoende koeling. Verdamper deels bevroren maar geen koudemiddelstroming hoorbaar. Leiding vóór expansieventiel warm (30°C), leiding erna direct bevroren. Groot temperatuurverschil voor/na ventiel. Koudemiddelcirculatie verhinderd.

worldstate_json: {"current_state": {"room_temp": -22.0, "hot_gas_temp": 48.0, "liquid_temp": 28.0, "suction_temp": -28.0, "ambient_temp": 24.0, "door_open": false}, "flags": {"main_temp_high": true, "hot_gas_low": false, "liquid_extreme": false, "suction_extreme": false, "ambient_extreme": false}, "trends_30m": {"room_temp_trend": 0.5, "door_open_ratio": 0.0}, "health_scores": {"cooling_performance": 70, "compressor_health": 80}}
typical_pattern: Temperatuur blijft buiten bereik (-22°C ipv -33°C) ondanks werkende componenten. Regelaar geeft geen foutmelding. Parameters handmatig incorrect aangepast. Thermostaat verkeerd ingesteld. Systeem werkt maar niet volgens ontwerp.

worldstate_json: {"current_state": {"room_temp": -18.0, "hot_gas_temp": 42.0, "liquid_temp": 35.0, "suction_temp": -22.0, "ambient_temp": 23.0, "door_open": false}, "flags": {"main_temp_high": true, "hot_gas_low": false, "liquid_extreme": true, "suction_extreme": false, "ambient_extreme": false}, "trends_30m": {"room_temp_trend": 1.0, "door_open_ratio": 0.05}, "health_scores": {"cooling_performance": 55, "compressor_health": 65}}
typical_pattern: Onvoldoende koeling. Zichtglas toont geen stroming koudemiddel. Vloeistofleiding gedeeltelijk verstopt door vervuiling. Drukval zonder duidelijke reden. Ongelijke temperatuur op leidingen. Filterdroger verzadigd.

worldstate_json: {"current_state": {"room_temp": -28.0, "hot_gas_temp": 72.0, "liquid_temp": 50.0, "suction_temp": -35.0, "ambient_temp": 38.0, "door_open": false}, "flags": {"main_temp_high": false, "hot_gas_low": false, "liquid_extreme": false, "suction_extreme": false, "ambient_extreme": true}, "trends_30m": {"room_temp_trend": 0.3, "door_open_ratio": 0.0}, "health_scores": {"cooling_performance": 75, "compressor_health": 50}}
typical_pattern: Systeem werkt maar inefficiënt. Condensatietemperatuur te hoog door hoge omgevingstemperatuur (38°C). Heetgas extreem warm (72°C). Compressor zwaar belast. Hoog energieverbruik. Condensor kan warmte niet kwijt.

worldstate_json: {"current_state": {"room_temp": -31.0, "hot_gas_temp": 40.0, "liquid_temp": 26.0, "suction_temp": -32.0, "ambient_temp": 24.0, "door_open": false}, "flags": {"main_temp_high": false, "hot_gas_low": true, "liquid_extreme": false, "suction_extreme": false, "ambient_extreme": false}, "trends_30m": {"room_temp_trend": -0.1, "door_open_ratio": 0.0}, "health_scores": {"cooling_performance": 85, "compressor_health": 45}}
typical_pattern: Oververhitting te klein ingesteld (<5K). Risico vloeibaar koudemiddel naar compressor (liquid slugging). Zuigtemperatuur te dicht bij verdamptemperatuur. Heetgas laag. Compressor gevaar voor schade.

worldstate_json: {"current_state": {"room_temp": -25.0, "hot_gas_temp": 58.0, "liquid_temp": 32.0, "suction_temp": -30.0, "ambient_temp": 25.0, "door_open": true}, "flags": {"main_temp_high": true, "hot_gas_low": false, "liquid_extreme": false, "suction_extreme": false, "ambient_extreme": false}, "trends_30m": {"room_temp_trend": 1.2, "door_open_ratio": 0.35}, "health_scores": {"cooling_performance": 65, "compressor_health": 75}}
typical_pattern: Temperatuur te hoog door excessive belading. Deur vaak open (35% van tijd). Productinput boven ontwerpwaarden. Compressor draait continu. Koelvermogen onvoldoende voor belasting. Systeem kan vraag niet bijhouden.

worldstate_json: {"current_state": {"room_temp": -26.0, "hot_gas_temp": 52.0, "liquid_temp": 28.0, "suction_temp": -28.0, "ambient_temp": 24.0, "door_open": false}, "flags": {"main_temp_high": true, "hot_gas_low": false, "liquid_extreme": false, "suction_extreme": true, "ambient_extreme": false}, "trends_30m": {"room_temp_trend": 0.6, "door_open_ratio": 0.0}, "health_scores": {"cooling_performance": 70, "compressor_health": 60}}
typical_pattern: Koudemiddel te weinig. Zichtglas toont bubbels of geen vloeistof. Zuigdruk te laag. Onderkoeling te klein. Compressor zuigt te hard. Koelvermogen beperkt. Mogelijk lekkage in systeem.

worldstate_json: {"current_state": {"room_temp": -35.0, "hot_gas_temp": 42.0, "liquid_temp": 24.0, "suction_temp": -36.0, "ambient_temp": 23.0, "door_open": false}, "flags": {"main_temp_high": false, "hot_gas_low": true, "liquid_extreme": false, "suction_extreme": false, "ambient_extreme": false}, "trends_30m": {"room_temp_trend": -0.2, "door_open_ratio": 0.0}, "health_scores": {"cooling_performance": 95, "compressor_health": 55}}
typical_pattern: Te veel koudemiddel in systeem. Onderkoeling te groot. Vloeistof in zuigleiding risico. Heetgas laag. Verdamper niet volledig benut (veel vloeibaar koudemiddel). Compressor risico liquid slugging.

worldstate_json: {"current_state": {"room_temp": -30.0, "hot_gas_temp": 68.0, "liquid_temp": 42.0, "suction_temp": -35.0, "ambient_temp": 28.0, "door_open": false}, "flags": {"main_temp_high": false, "hot_gas_low": false, "liquid_extreme": false, "suction_extreme": false, "ambient_extreme": false}, "trends_30m": {"room_temp_trend": 0.2, "door_open_ratio": 0.0}, "health_scores": {"cooling_performance": 80, "compressor_health": 60}}
typical_pattern: Condensatiedruk geleidelijk stijgend. Heetgas warmer dan normaal (68°C vs 50°C design). Condensor lamellen vervuild met stof. Luchtstroom beperkt. Warmteafvoer verminderd. Hoog energieverbruik.

worldstate_json: {"current_state": {"room_temp": -26.0, "hot_gas_temp": 54.0, "liquid_temp": 30.0, "suction_temp": -32.0, "ambient_temp": 24.0, "door_open": true}, "flags": {"main_temp_high": true, "hot_gas_low": false, "liquid_extreme": false, "suction_extreme": false, "ambient_extreme": false}, "trends_30m": {"room_temp_trend": 1.8, "door_open_ratio": 0.55}, "health_scores": {"cooling_performance": 60, "compressor_health": 85}}
typical_pattern: Deur vaak/lang open (55% van tijd). Compressor draait continu maar temperatuur stijgt. Warmte influx hoger dan koelvermogen. Productinput boven ontwerpwaarden. Geen component defect maar gebruik boven ontwerp.

worldstate_json: {"current_state": {"room_temp": -33.0, "hot_gas_temp": 50.0, "liquid_temp": 28.0, "suction_temp": -38.0, "ambient_temp": 24.0, "door_open": false}, "flags": {"main_temp_high": false, "hot_gas_low": false, "liquid_extreme": false, "suction_extreme": false, "ambient_extreme": false}, "trends_30m": {"room_temp_trend": 0.0, "door_open_ratio": 0.05}, "health_scores": {"cooling_performance": 100, "compressor_health": 100}}
typical_pattern: Systeem in balans. Temperatuur op setpoint (-33°C). Drukken normaal. Oververhitting 5K (design). Onderkoeling 3K (design). Compressor cyclet normaal. Geen flags actief. Alle parameters binnen bandbreedte.
balance_factors: Alle componenten en factoren in balans
